name: Amazon AppFlow
short: A fully managed integration service on AWS that enables secure data transfer between software as a service (SaaS) applications and AWS services.
description: Amazon AppFlow is a fully managed integration service that enables secure and seamless data transfer between AWS services and SaaS applications in real-time. It supports a variety of data sources and targets, eliminating the need for custom connectors or code. With AppFlow, users can automate data flows, transform data, and handle error resolution. It’s suitable for a range of use-cases such as data migration, data warehousing, real-time analytics, and machine learning. No extensive technical knowledge is required to utilize this service.
